dialogue: YOU WIN AND HEAD BACK TO THE TAVERN
YOU GAIN CONSCIOUS AND SEE A BARTENDER WORKING AWAY
THE BARTENDER CONGRATULATES YOU AND HINTS AT YOU TO ENTER THE CATACOMBS
YOU LOOK AT THE BARTENDER BEWILDERED AND SIGH AND HE TELLS YOU ONE LAST MISSION
GO TO THE TOWER AND DEFEAT COVIZARD HE SAID
YOU ARE TIRED AND HEAD BACK TO THE TAVERN
